name: GridPaper
desc: A widget that draws a rectilinear grid of lines one pixel wide.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color to draw the lines in the grid.

fields.name: interval
fields.desc: The distance between the primary lines in the grid, in logical pixels.

fields.name: divisions
fields.desc: The number of major divisions within each primary grid cell.

fields.name: subdivisions
fields.desc: The number of minor divisions within each major division, including the major division itself.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

nodes.name: GridPager Subdivision
desc: 【subdivisions】: Number of sub-blocks in a small block   【int】
【divisions】: Number of subdivisions of sub-blocks in a small block   【int】
